name: HIVInfectionCombinationTestsForHIVAntigenAndAntibody
title: HIV Infection (Combination Tests for HIV Antigen and Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of HIV antigen and antibodies),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: 	 HIV 1+2 Ab+HIV1 p24 Ag;  LOINC search: "(HIV 1+2 Ab or HIV 1+2 Ag) -panel"),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests)

HIV 1+2 Ab and HIV1 p24 Ag [Identifier] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
